Package org.mff

Class PlayerClient

java.lang.Object
org.mff.PlayerClient
public class PlayerClient extends Object
Represents player client. Governs the client server communication.

    • processSet

      private void processSet() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Processes the set command. Sends the SET request, gets the character from the server and continuously processes the commands to set fields of the character. Sends the potentially changed character back to the server.
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • processView

      private void processView() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Processes the View command. Sends VIEW request and handles the response.
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • processPick

      public void processPick() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Processes the Pick command. Sends LIST request, handles the response, sends the Message with the picked character. Handles the response.
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • authenticate

      private void authenticate() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Handles authentication on the client side. Sends AUTH request and handles the response.
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • stopConnection

      private void stopConnection() throws IOException
      Stops the connection with the server.

    • handleIfError

      private boolean handleIfError(Message m)
      Checks if the message is of ERROR type. If so, handles the error.
      Parameters:
      m - message to handle
      Returns:
      true if the message is and ERROR, false otherwise
